name: product-sales-tracker

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && cp src/renderer/index.html dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/login.html dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/styles.css dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/login-styles.css dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/login.js dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/secret-window.html dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/secret-window.js dist/renderer/ && cp src/renderer/offline.html dist/renderer/ && mkdir -p dist/renderer/translations && cp src/renderer/translations/*.json dist/renderer/translations/

description: A focused Electron application for tracking products and sales without customer management. This application allows you to manage your product inventory and record sales transactions, with daily reporting capabilities.
